Verses: 1 karththar Seenaaimalaiyil Moseyai Nokki:
2 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Naan Ungalukkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththile Neengal Poi Serndhirukkumpodhu, Dhesam Karththarukkendru Oivu Kondaadavendum.
3 aaru Varusham Un Vayalai Vidhaiththu, Un Dhraatchaththottaththaik Kilaikazhiththu, Adhin Palanai Serppaayaaga.
4 ezhaam Varushaththilo, Karththarukkendru Oindhirukkum Oivu Dhesaththirku Irukkavendum; Adhil Un Vayalai Vidhaikkaamalum Un Dhraatchaththottaththaik Kilaikazhikkaamalum,
5 thaanaai Vilaindhu Payiraanadhai Arukkaamalum, Kilaikazhikkaadhevitta Dhraatchachchediyin Pazhangalai Serkkaamalum Iruppaayaaga; Dhesaththukku Adhu Oivuvarushamaayirukkakkadavadhu.
6 dhesaththin Oivile Payiraagiradhu Ungalukku Aagaaramaayiruppadhaaga; Un Velaikkaaranukkum, Un Velaikkaarikkum, Un Koolikkaaranukkum, Unnidaththil Thangugira Anniyanukkum,
7 un Naattumirugaththukkum, Un Dhesaththil Irukkira Kaattumirugaththukkum Adhil Vilaindhiruppadhellaam Aagaaramaayiruppadhaaga.
8 andriyum, Ezhu Oivu Varushangalulla Ezhu Ezhu Varushangalai Ennuvaayaaga; Andha Ezhu Oivu Varushangalum Naarpaththonbadhu Varushamaagum.
9 appozhudhum Ezhaam Maadham Paththaanthedhiyil Ekkaalachchaththam Thonikkumpadi Seyyavendum; Paavanivaarananaalil Ungal Dhesamengum Ekkaalachchaththam Thonikkumpadi Seyyavendum.

10 aimbadhaam Varushaththaip Parisuththamaakki , Dhesamengum Adhin Kudigalukkellaam Vidudhalai Koorakkadaveergal; Adhu Ungalukku Yoopili Varusham; Adhile Ungalil Ovvoruvanum Than Than Kaaniyaatchikkum Than Than Kudumbaththukkum Thirumbip Pogakkadavan.

11 andha Aimbadhaam Varusham Ungalukku Yoopili Varushamaayiruppadhaaga; Adhile Vidhaikkaamalum, Thaanaai Vilaindhu Payiraanadhai Arukkaamalum, Kilaikazhikkaamal Vidappatta Dhraatcha Sediyin Pazhangalai Serkkaamalum Iruppeergalaaga.
12 adhu Yoopili Varusham; Adhu Ungalukkup Parisuththamaayirukkavendum; Andha Varushaththil Vayalveliyil Vilaindhavaigalai Neengal Pusikkavendum.
13 andha Yoopili Varushaththil Ungalil Avanavan Than Than Kaaniyaatchikkuth Thirumbippogakkadavan.
14 aagaiyaal, Piranukku Edhaiyaavadhu Vitraalum, Avanidaththil Edhaiyaavadhu Kondaalum Oruvarukkoruvar Aniyaayam Seyyakkoodaadhu.
15 yoopili Varushaththukkup Pinvarum Varushangalin Thogaikkerkap Piranidaththil Kolluvaayaaga; Palanulla Varushangalin Thogaikkerka Avan Unakku Virpaanaaga.
16 palanulla Varushangalin Lakkaththaip Paarththu Avan Unakku Virkirapadiyaal, Varushangalin Thogai Erinaal Vilaiyeravum, Varushangalin Thogai Kuraindhaal, Vilai Kuraiyavumvendum.
17 ungalil Oruvanum Piranukku Aniyaayancheyyakkoodaadhu; Un Dhevanukku Bayappadavendum; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
18 en Kattalaigalinpadi Seydhu, En Nyaayangalaik Kaikkondu Avaigalinpadi Nadakkakkadaveergal; Appozhudhu Dhesaththile Sugamaaikkudiyiruppeergal.
19 boomi Than Kaniyaiththarum; Neengal Thirupthiyaaga Saappittu, Adhil Sugamaaik Kudiyiruppeergal.
20 ezhaam Varushaththil Edhaip Pusippom? Naangal Vidhaikkaamalum, Vilaindhadhai Serkkaamalum Irukkavendume! Endru Solveergalaanaal,
21 naan Aaraam Varushaththil Ungalukku Aaseervaadhaththai Anukkiragampannuven; Adhu Ungalukku Moondru Varushaththin Palanaiththarum.
22 neengal Ettaam Varushaththile Vidhaiththu, Onbadhaam Varushammattum Pazhaiya Palanile Saappiduveergal; Adhin Palan Vilaiyumvaraikkum Pazhaiya Palanai Saappiduveergal.
23 dhesam Ennudaiyadhaayirukkirapadiyaal, Neengal Nilangalai Arudhiyaai Virkavendaam; Neengal Paradhesigalum Ennidaththil Purakkudigalumaayirukkireergal.
24 ungal Kaaniyaatchiyaana Dhesamengum Nilangalai Meettukkolla Idankodukkakkadaveergal.
25 ungal Sagodharan Dhariththirappattu , Than Kaaniyaatchiyile Siladhai Vitraal, Avan Inaththaan Oruvan Vandhu, Than Sagodharan Vitradhai Meetkakkadavan.
26 adhai Meetka Oruvanum Illaamal, Thaane Adhai Meetkaththakkavanaanaal,
27 adhai Vitrapin Sendra Varushangalin Thogaiyaith Thalli, Meendha Thogaiyai Etri, Kondavanukkuk Koduththu, Avan Than Kaaniyaatchikkuth Thirumbippogakkadavan.

28 appadik Koduppadharkaana Nirvaagam Avanukku Illaavittaal, Avan Vitradhu Vaanginavan Kaiyile Yoopili Varushammattum Irundhu, Yoopili Varushaththile Adhu Vidudhalaiyaagum; Appozhudhu Avan Than Kaaniyaatchikkuth Thirumbappovaan.
29 oruvan Madhilsoozhndha Pattanaththilulla Than Vaasasthalamaagiya Veettai Vitraal, Adhai Vitra Oru Varushaththukkul Adhai Meettukkollalaam; Oru Varushaththukkullaagave Adhai Meettukkollavendum.

30 oru Varushaththukkulle Adhai Meettukkollaadhirundhaal, Madhilsoozhndha Pattanaththilulla Andha Veedu Thalaimuraithorum Adhai Vaanginavanukke Uriyadhaagum; Yoopili Varushaththilum Adhu Vidudhalaiyaagaadhu .
31 madhil Soozhappadaadha Graamangalilulla Veedugalo, Dhesaththin Nilangal Polave Ennappadum; Avaigal Meetkappadalaam; Yoopili Varushaththil Avaigal Vidudhalaiyaagum.
32 leviyarin Kaaniyaatchiyaagiya Pattanangalilulla Veedugalaiyo Leviyar Ekkaalaththilum Meettukkollalaam.

33 isravel Puththirarukkulle Leviyarudaiya Pattanangalilulla Veedugal Avargalukkuriya Kaaniyaatchiyaanapadiyaal, Leviyaridaththil Avanudaiya Kaaniyaatchippattanaththilulla Veettai Oruvan Vaanginaal, Virkappatta Andha Veedu Yoopili Varushaththil Vidudhalaiyaagum.
34 avargal Pattanangalai Soozhndha Velinilam Virkappadalaagaadhu; Adhu Avargalukku Niththiya Kaaniyaatchiyaayirukkum.
35 un Sagodharan Dhariththirappattu, Kaiyilaiththupponavanaanaal, Avanai Aadharikkavendum; Paradhesiyaippolum Thangavandhavanaippolum Avan Unnode Pizhaippaanaaga.
36 nee Avan Kaiyil Vattiyaavadhu Polisaiyaavadhu Vaangaamal, Un Dhevanukku Bayandhu, Un Sagodharan Unnode Pizhaikkumpadi Seyvaayaaga.
37 avanukku Un Panaththai Vattikkum, Un Dhaaniyaththaip Polisaikkum Kodaayaaga.
38 ungalukkuk Kaanaan Dhesaththaik Koduththu, Ungalukku Dhevanaayirukkumpadi, Ungalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Naane.
39 un Sagodharan Dhariththiranaagi, Unakku Vilaippattupponaal, Avanai Adimaiyaippola Oozhiyancheyya Nerukkavendaam.
40 avan Koolikkaaranaippolavum Thangavandhavanaippolavum Unnode Irundhu, Yoopili Varushammattum Unnidaththil Sevikkakkadavan.
41 pinbu, Than Pillaigalodunkooda Unnai Vittu Neengalaagi, Than Kudumbaththaaridaththukkum Than Pidhaakkalin Kaaniyaatchikkum Thirumbippogakkadavan.
42 avargal Naan Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Ennudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar; Aagaiyaal Avargal Adimaigalaaga Virkappadalaagaadhu.
43 nee Avanaik Kodooramaai Aalaamal Un Dhevanukku Bayandhiru.
44 unakku Irukkum Aan Adimaiyum Pen Adimaiyum Sutrilum Irukkira Purajaadhigalaayirukkavendum; Avargalil Nee Aan Adimaiyaiyum Pen Adimaiyaiyum Vilaikku Vaangalaam.

45 ungalidaththile Paradhesigalaaith Thangugira Anniya Puththirarilum, Ungal Dhesaththil Ungalidaththile Pirandhirukkira Avargaludaiya Kudumbaththaarilum Neengal Ungalukku Adimaigalaik Kondu, Avargalai Ungalukku Sudhandharamaakkalaam.

46 avargalai Ungalukkup Pinvarum Ungal Sandhadhiyaarum Sudhandharikkumpadi Neengal Avargalai Sudhandharamaakkikkollalaam; Endraikkum Avargal Ungalukku Adimaigalaayirukkalaam; Ungal Sagodhararaagiya Isravel Puththiraro Oruvaraiyoruvar Kodooramaaga Aalak Koodaadhu.

47 unnidaththil Irukkira Paradhesiyum Anniyanum Selvanaayirukka, Avanidaththil Irukkira Un Sagodharan Dhariththirappattu, Andhap Paradhesikkaavadhu, Anniyanukkaavadhu, Paradhesiyin Kudumbaththaaril Evanukkaavadhu Avan Vilaippattupponaal,
48 avan Vilaippattupponapin Thirumba Meetkappadalaam; Avan Sagodhararil Oruvan Avanai Meetkalaam.

49 avanudaiya Pidhaavin Sagodharanaavadhu, Andha Sagodharanudaiya Puththiranaavadhu, Avan Kudumbaththilulla Avanai Serndha Inaththaaril Evanaavadhu Avanai Meetkalaam; Thannaal Koodumaanaal, Thannaiththaane Meettukkollalaam.

50 avan Thaan Vilaippatta Varushanthodangi, Yoopili Varushamvaraikkum Undaana Kaalaththaith Thannai Vilaikkukkondavanudan Kanakkuppaarkkakkadavan; Avanudaiya Vilaikkirayam Koolikkaaranudaiya Kaalakkanakkuppola, Varushaththogaikku Oththuppaarkkavendum.
51 innum Anega Varushangal Irundhaal, Avan Than Vilaikkirayaththile Avaigalukkuth Thakkadhaith Thannai Meetkumporulaagath Thirumbak Kodukkakkadavan.
52 yoopili Varushammattum Meedhiyaayirukkira Varushangal Konjameyaanaal, Avanode Kanakkup Paarththu, Than Varushangalukkuth Thakkadhai, Thannai Meetkumporulaagath Thirumbak Kodukkavendum.
53 ivan Varushaththirku Varusham Kooliporundhikkonda Koolikkaaranaippola, Avanidaththil Irukkavendum; Avan Ivanai Unakku Munbaagak Kodooramaai Aalak Koodaadhu.
54 ippadi Ivan Meettukkollappadaadhirundhaal, Ivanum Ivanodekooda Ivan Pillaigalum Yoopili Varushaththil Vidudhalaiyaavaargal.
55 isravel Puththirar En Oozhiyakkaarar; Avargal Naan Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina En Oozhiyakkaarare; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
